abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column observes colleges and universities are increasingly trying to expand their offerings in order to address emotional, spiritual and moral education of students and not just focusing on intellectual pursuits; suggests ways universities can return to original moral and spiritual mission in secularized manner that is fitting for current times.
lead_paragraph: Many universities founded as religious institutions have needlessly dropped a key original goal: educating students’ emotional, spiritual and moral sides.
